cloudinary.name: Cloudinary Integration
cloudinary.description: File upload and management with Cloudinary CDN

injections.code:
cloudinary: {
    cloudName: process.env.CLOUDINARY_CLOUD_NAME!,
    apiKey: process.env.CLOUDINARY_API_KEY!,
    apiSecret: process.env.CLOUDINARY_API_SECRET!,
    uploadPreset: process.env.CLOUDINARY_UPLOAD_PRESET!,
    secure: true,
  },

request-context.name: Request Context Middleware
request-context.description: Per-request async context tracking using AsyncLocalStorage

workers.name: Background Workers and Queue System
workers.description: Background worker infrastructure for async job processing and queue system for background task management

injections.code: "start:worker": "APP_TYPE=server WORKER_TYPE=index nvm use && node dist/src/workers/index.js", "dev:worker": "nvm use && tsx -r tsconfig-paths/register src/workers/index.ts"
